Text:
Hey TvTeam,

Many thanks for this upload!  Truly appreciate it.  Are you guys planning to upload an updated version of  MAPublisher when Avenza updates it to Adobe Illustrator CS5?  I really hope you guys do.  Thanks so much for thus upload!
It would be great to have version 8.6 for Adobe Illustrator CS5.1
version 8.6 for Adobe Illustrator CS4, CS5 & CS5.1
